document_data.mainbody:
Varce Humbletood was an inhabitant of the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Varce was a human with light skin tone, aquamarine eyes, and light brown hair.
In the , Varce Humbletood was a customer of the Facemaker Fashion boutique. On the day the shops proprietor was attacked by the Bhaalist assassins, Varce impatiently waited for his hair appointment in a queue outside of the shop.
